item.description:
A 4 hr. loop hike of moderate difficulty near the south-central shore area in this 1,200 acre sanctuary with 39 miles of very interesting trails. This is my "Indiana Jones" hike which will involve traversing modest cliffs, going through rockfall caves, a small bit of a climb, and interesting rock formations and sights!

The trails have a unique blaze system (http://www.westwoodst... ). North-south trails are marked with a circle shaped blaze. Square or triangular trails weave back and forth connecting circle trails. Crossover trails that connect two circle trails of different colors are marked with an X of the color of the circle they lead to. Complicated?

Those who wish to go should have:
* A daypack - To carry trail food, water, and any extra items.
* Waterproofed hiking boots (sneakers not advised!)
* 1 - 2 quarts of water
* Pants you don't mind possibly getting dirty from crawling
* Bug spray

The meetup will be at 9 AM at the parking area. Parking may be limited so RSVP's are limited. We would finish up at about 1 PM and some lunch out if the group feels like socializing more.


General directions (from a trail source):
* Take Exit 58 off I-95
* Take Route 77 south (toward Guilford) about 0.5 mile
* Turn right (west) onto Route 1 and go 0.7 mile
* Bear left onto Peddlers Rd. and drive 1.1 miles
* Parking area on left just past Denison Dr.

Aproximate location/directions via MapQuest:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Westwoods interactive trail map:
http://www.westwoodst...

Westwoods Reserve website (with trail maps):
http://www.westwoodst...
Printed maps available:
http://www.westwoodst...
Map is in "Connecticut Walk Book: East" 19th ed., by Connecticut forest and Park Association as map WW-1

Guilford Land Trust (maintains Westwoods):
http://www.guilfordla...


=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Dark blue Dodge Grandcaravan, CT plates. Meet at hike location.
